document_data.name: Evenstar Lake
document_data.mainbody: '''Evenstar Lake''' was a lake in northern [[Turmish]].{{Cite polyhedron/101/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Turmish Customers and Festivals}}
document_data.Geography:
Fed by the [[Alaoreum River]], it lay west of [[Alaghôn]], southeast of [[Ironcloak]], and northeast of [[Nonthal]]. A trail ran from the lake to Nonthal.The location of Evenstar Vale is unknown, but ''Polyhedron'' #101 says it is "west of Alaghôn". By the shared location and name, it is presumed to be around the river and lake. It was surrounded by dense forests.<ref> 

In these forests lived small [[bird]]s called [[bloodybeak]]s. These fed on the [[mosquito]]es that were common around the lake.<ref>
document_data.Activities: Evenstar Vale was a popular meeting place for lovers on the night of the local [[Turmish#Days_&_Festivals|Feast of the Moon]] celebration.
